Class ProjectManager

java.lang.Object
ProjectManager
public class ProjectManager extends Object
The ProjectManager class handles the creation, management, and processing of HDB housing projects, including project registrations, filtering, editing, and deletion. It maintains lists for all projects, active, inactive, and expired projects.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ProjectManager()
    Constructs a new ProjectManager with empty project lists.

      public ProjectManager()
      Constructs a new ProjectManager with empty project lists.

  • Method Details

    • registerAsOfficer

      public static void registerAsOfficer(HDBOfficer officer)
      Registers an HDB officer to a selected project if they meet the conditions and are not already assigned or applying.
      Parameters:
      officer - The HDB officer attempting to register.

    • processOfficerRegistration

      public static void processOfficerRegistration(HDBManager manager)
      Processes pending officer registration requests by approving or rejecting them.
      Parameters:
      manager - The HDB manager overseeing the project.

    • viewOfficerRegistration

      public static void viewOfficerRegistration(HDBManager manager)
      Displays all pending officer registration requests for the manager's project.
      Parameters:
      manager - The HDB manager handling the project.

    • viewAllProject

      public static void viewAllProject(Filter filter)
      Displays all available projects filtered by the specified criteria.
      Parameters:
      filter - A Filter object specifying criteria such as location, price, and visibility.

    • viewOwnProject

      public static void viewOwnProject(HDBManager manager, Filter filter)
      Displays projects created by the manager, filtered by the specified criteria.
      Parameters:
      manager - The HDB manager.
      filter - The filter object to apply to the project list.

    • createProject

      public static void createProject(HDBManager manager)
      Creates a new housing project with user input and assigns it to the given manager. Also places it in the appropriate project list based on application dates.
      Parameters:
      manager - The HDB manager creating the project.

    • editProject

      public static void editProject(HDBManager manager)
      Allows editing of specific attributes of a project managed by the HDB manager.
      Parameters:
      manager - The HDB manager editing the project.

    • deleteProject

      public static void deleteProject(HDBManager manager)
      Deletes the current project being managed and removes it from all project lists.
      Parameters:
      manager - The HDB manager deleting the project.

    • viewProjectDetails

      public static void viewProjectDetails(HDBOfficer officer)
      Displays full project details of the project an HDB officer is currently managing.
      Parameters:
      officer - The officer viewing the project.

      public static void printLocations()
